PROJECTS.SUBTITLE: My recent hobby Full-Stack App
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION:
Showflix is a single-page application (SPA) for browsing and managing a collection of over 1000 movies, built with a RESTful API and a connected database.

Users can search, filter, sort, comment on movies, and add them to their favorites with automatic genre-based statistics.

The app includes authentication and authorization - admins can manage the movie database, while users can manage their profiles.

Additional features include theme customization, with support for light/dark modes and a selectable color palette.
